description:
## Objective 
Add pictures/screenshots of the application in README.md file .

##Steps
1. Install mifos-mobile-cn android app in your phone .
2. Attach screenshots of all screens in proper format in README.md file

##References
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14494747/add-images-to-readme-md-on-github

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN app: Add screenshots of Mifos Mobile CN android app in README
